content.heading: Introduction
content.text: At MyxoFlow, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard information.

content.heading: Data We Collect
content.text: We collect personal information you provide, such as your name, email, phone number, and company details. We may also collect technical information through our platform usage, including IP address, browser type, and device identifiers.

content.heading: How We Use Data
content.text: We use your data to deliver services, communicate with you, optimize platform performance, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell or lease your data to third parties.

content.heading: Data Retention
content.text: Personal information is retained only as long as necessary for service delivery, legal compliance, or legitimate business purposes. Once no longer required, your data is securely deleted or anonymized.

content.heading: Your Rights
content.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data, and to withdraw consent at any time by contacting info@myxoflow.com.

content.heading: Contact
content.text: For questions about this policy or data handling practices, reach us at info@myxoflow.com.

content.heading: What Are Cookies?
content.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our website and platform.

content.heading: How We Use Cookies
content.text: We use cookies for authentication, analytics, and user experience improvements. This helps us identify returning visitors and optimize platform performance.

content.heading: Managing Cookies
content.text: You can disable cookies via your browser settings, though this may impact certain site functions. Refer to your browser documentation for details.

content.heading: Third-Party Cookies
content.text: Some cookies may come from third-party services (like analytics or payment gateways). These are subject to their respective privacy policies.

content.heading: Introduction
content.text: By using MyxoFlow services, you agree to these terms. Please review them carefully before engaging with our platform.

content.heading: Use of Services
content.text: You agree to use our services lawfully and responsibly. Any misuse or attempt to disrupt operations may result in suspension or termination.

content.heading: Intellectual Property
content.text: All platform content, code, and branding are the intellectual property of MyxoFlow. You may not reproduce or redistribute materials without express permission.

content.heading: Limitation of Liability
content.text: MyxoFlow shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from service use. Liability is limited to the fullest extent permitted by law.

content.heading: Changes to Terms
content.text: We may modify these terms periodically. Continued use of our services implies acceptance of the updated version.

content.heading: General Disclaimer
content.text: The information provided by MyxoFlow is for general informational purposes only. While we strive for accuracy, we make no guarantees about completeness or reliability.

content.heading: Professional Disclaimer
content.text: MyxoFlow does not provide legal, financial, or business advice. Any reliance you place on information from our site is strictly at your own risk.

content.heading: External Links Disclaimer
content.text: Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of those external websites.

content.heading: Scope of Data Processing
content.text: This DPA outlines responsibilities related to personal data processing between MyxoFlow and its clients in compliance with GDPR and other applicable laws.

content.heading: Roles and Responsibilities
content.text: MyxoFlow acts as a data processor and follows all lawful instructions from the data controller. Both parties agree to maintain adequate security and confidentiality.

content.heading: Subprocessors
content.text: We only engage trusted subprocessors who meet equivalent data protection standards and operate within approved jurisdictions.

content.heading: Data Breach Notification
content.text: In the event of a data breach, MyxoFlow will notify affected controllers without undue delay and assist in any necessary mitigation efforts.
